meanings.definition: The bone on the little finger side of the forearm.
meanings.sent1: She felt pain in her ulnad after falling on her arm.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the ulnad to check for any fractures.
meanings.sent3: The ulnad bone decided to take a break from supporting the arm.
meanings.sent4: The ulnad was as sturdy as a pillar holding up the forearm.
meanings.sent5: The ulnad bone looked like a slender rod supporting the arm.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the ulna.
meanings.sent1: The ulnad nerve was responsible for the tingling sensation in her hand.
meanings.sent2: He wore a brace to support his ulnad joint during the game.
meanings.sent3: The ulnad gloves were designed for extra protection during work.
meanings.sent4: Her ulnad strength was crucial for lifting heavy objects.
meanings.sent5: The ulnad bandage provided support and stability to the injured arm.
